### What is expected to happen?



### What does happen?

## Checklist
<!-- Please check the boxes by putting an `x` in the `[ ]` like so: `[x]` -->

- [ ] I searched for existing GitHub issues
- [ ] I updated all Cordova tooling to the most recent version
